mapper.select: SELECT MT.TALKROOM_NO TALKROOM_NO, T.MANAGER_NO MANAGER_NO, T.STUDY_NO STUDY_NO, T.TALKROOM_TYPE TALKROOM_TYPE, M.MEMBER_INTRO MEMBER_INTRO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_IMG MEMBER_IMG, M.MENTOR_VALID MENTOR_VALID FROM MEMBER_TALKROOM MT INNER JOIN TALKROOM T ON (MT.TALKROOM_NO = T.TALKROOM_NO) AND MT.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND TALKROOM_TYPE = 1 INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (T.MANAGER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO)

SELECT MT.TALKROOM_NO TALKROOM_NO, T.MANAGER_NO MANAGER_NO, T.STUDY_NO STUDY_NO, T.TALKROOM_TYPE TALKROOM_TYPE, S.STUDY_NAME STUDY_NAME, S.STUDY_IMG STUDY_IMG FROM MEMBER_TALKROOM MT INNER JOIN TALKROOM T ON (MT.TALKROOM_NO = T.TALKROOM_NO) AND MT.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND TALKROOM_TYPE = 2 INNER JOIN STUDY S ON (T.STUDY_NO = S.STUDY_NO)

SELECT MSG.MESSAGE_NO , MSG.TALKROOM_NO , MSG.MEMBER_NO , M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_IMG, MSG.MESSAGE_CONTENT , MSG.MESSAGE_DATE FROM MESSAGE MSG INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = MSG.MEMBER_NO) AND MSG.TALKROOM_NO = #{talkroomNo} ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_NO DESC
